column4: hey you guys what do I need to get wireless adapters to work on my laptop?
What make/model wifi card?
genii they are both lynksys, one a wusb12 and the other a wusb54gsv4
usb wifi is tricky, the driver that would work if it wasn't on the usb doesn't usually.
genii I also have a linksys pcmcia card I can use, will that be easier?
with the wusb12 in does lsmod show prism2_usb as a module installed?
genii yes
Then it should be able to work
Do you see a wlan0 device on the ifconfig command?
genii I don't see wlan0
try: sudo ifconfig wlan0 up
genii I get SIOCSIFFLAGS: No Such Device
Bah, OK. Do you see an eth1 device where you know you have only 1 wired adapter then?
nope I just have eth0 and lo
OK, perhaps add with admin privelege to /etc/network/interfaces   2 lines   line1:  auto wlan0       line2: iface wlan0 inet dhcp
genii ok ill try that
Hopefully your access point is set to hand out dhcp numbers
after saving those 2 lines, try again sudo ifconfig wlan0 up
genii I get the same error SIOCSIFFLAGS: No such device
Bah ok. I'm not overly familiar with usb troubleshooting so I'd recommend the pcmcia adapter at this point unless another here can help further with the usb one
you don't think I would have a problem with a pcmcia adapter?

ouellettesr:I just had a disconnect/reconnect so last msg not sure you got:  Bah ok. I'm not overly familiar with usb troubleshooting so I'd recommend the pcmcia adapter at this point unless another here can help further with the usb one
Since the pcmcia works as part of the pci it is less problemmatic
cool I think ill get one of them now
